title: Second Date Update - PT 2: We Can't Believe Why This Man Ghosted Our Listener!
description:
Here’s how second date update works: you had a first date, it was great, you think a second one is coming…and then out of nowhere, they drop you. No second date, no nothing. But things were going SO WELL – what happened?!
Our listener when on what she thought was first great date. But after the date, she NEVER heard back from the guy. So we reached out to him to find out why he ditch her. His answer was a response we never expected to hear. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
